question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about Stainless Steel?
option1: it is also known as inox steel
option2: It is an alloy of Iron, cobalt and nickel
option4: molybdenum is added to increase corrosion resistance in reducing acids
answer: It is an alloy of Iron, cobalt and nickel
explanation: Stainless steel is also known as inox steel. It is an alloy of Iron, chromium and nickel. It is corrosion resistant and molybdenum is added to increase corrosion resistance in reducing acids.
